feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Urgent Fix: undefined resolver doesn't let to schedule a post
entry.content:
This is the 1st bug coming up after changing to pnpm

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.43.0...v1.43.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix OIDC / OAuth Trailing Slashes / Initial Release of Chrome Extension
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Intial release of chrome extension by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/735
  • fix(oidc): remove trailling / needed but add by User & Missing Oauth on /auth by @DrummyFloyd in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/736

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.43.1...v1.43.2

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix for react-hook-form
entry.content: It seems like after upgrading to pnpm react-hook-form not loading properly. For now, the quick fix is to add 1 millisecond with setTimeout to load everything.

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix redirect back after adding a channel
New release for Postiz: Disable image compression
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat/PR Docker Images by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/745
  • Disable image compression variable by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/750

Image compression

With DISABLE_IMAGE_COMPRESSION=true you can diable the image compression for postiz.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.43.4...v1.43.5
